response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. This special offer is designed to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece that is truly worth more than its weight in gold.
